hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: Use Multiworld to cross the gaps between worlds and engage in jolly co-operation!

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Castle# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #the Iron Boots#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Right Side Chest

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #10# major items.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #4# major items.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path to #Evil's Bane#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Water Trial Left Chest

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #crater's melody# is #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that plundering #Lake Hylia# is a foolish choice.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #Goron Shop#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: It's so lonely being stuck here with nobody else to talk to...

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Iron Boots# can be found in #Goron City#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Strength Upgrade#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Green Rupee# and #a Red Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Strength Upgrade#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Heart Container#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #the Spirit Temple Boss Key# and #a Heart Container#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path to #the Key#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Hallway Right Invisible Chest

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Sun's Song#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the path to #Morpha#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #20 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that within the #valley#, the crate and waterfall conceal...^ #a Blue Fire Bottle# and #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Red Rupee#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #the Water Temple Boss Key# and #a Heart Container#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Sun's Song#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Red Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that plundering #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Hover Boots# can be found #outside Ganon's Castle#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 5 Top

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #a Red Rupee# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #a Bomb Bag# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Lens of Truth Chest
Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest
